forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.
